archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.1.2i: i) specialist equipment (e.g. those used for heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC); physical access control and surveillance; and self-service terminals)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
